Sosa performed in venues such as the Lincoln Center in New York City, the ThÃƒÂ©ÃƒÂ¢tre Mogador in Paris and the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City, as well as sell-out shows in New York's Carnegie Hall and the Roman Colosseum during her final decade of life.
